body_html:
No, tensorflow-gpu supports CUDA 9 since 1.5. Tensorflow < 1.5 is unable to be compiled with CUDA 9. I have tried to compile 1.4 with CUDA9, but I failed.
See the tested source configurations in the following site.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#tested_source_configurations
body_text:
No, tensorflow-gpu supports CUDA 9 since 1.5. Tensorflow < 1.5 is unable to be compiled with CUDA 9. I have tried to compile 1.4 with CUDA9, but I failed.
See the tested source configurations in the following site.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#tested_source_configurations
body:
No, tensorflow-gpu supports CUDA 9 since 1.5. Tensorflow < 1.5 is unable to be compiled with CUDA 9. I have tried to compile 1.4 with CUDA9, but I failed.
See the tested source configurations in the following site.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#tested_source_configurations
